BackstoryDef.title: Military Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised within the Brotherhood after [PAWN_possessive] parents were killed by raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] showed exceptional tactical aptitude from childhood and studied pre-war military strategy extensively. The elder paladins saw in [PAWN_objective] a natural born leader who would one day command armies.

BackstoryDef.title: Supreme Commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the ranks to become the supreme military commander of the Midwestern Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] led the expansion across the wasteland, establishing order and recruiting worthy outsiders. [PAWN_possessive] tactical genius and unwavering determination made [PAWN_objective] a legend, though some say [PAWN_pronoun] became too obsessed with victory at any cost.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontline Survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up witnessing the brutal realities of wasteland warfare. [PAWN_pronoun] lost friends and comrades to super mutants, raiders, and worse. These experiences forged [PAWN_objective] into a hardened warrior who understood that only strength could protect the innocent.

BackstoryDef.title: Paladin Lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the title of Paladin Lord through countless battles across the Midwest. [PAWN_pronoun] commands multiple squads and leads critical missions deep into hostile territory. [PAWN_possessive] warriors would follow [PAWN_objective] into hell itself, knowing [PAWN_pronoun] would never abandon them.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a tribal community that the Midwestern Brotherhood encountered during their expansion. Unlike Lost Hills, the Midwest chapter saw potential in tribals. [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered to join, eager to prove that [PAWN_possessive] people deserved respect and could master advanced technology.

BackstoryDef.title: Paladin Exemplar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] proved all doubters wrong by rising to the rank of Paladin. [PAWN_pronoun] became a symbol of the Midwestern Brotherhood's inclusive philosophy - that strength and honor matter more than bloodlines. [PAWN_possessive] combat prowess and tactical mind earned respect from even the most traditional Brothers.

BackstoryDef.title: Bunker Born
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the Brotherhood's secure bunkers during the early days of expansion. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up training in combat from the moment [PAWN_pronoun] could hold a weapon. The bunker's cramped conditions taught [PAWN_objective] efficiency and discipline.

BackstoryDef.title: Senior Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to Senior Paladin through sheer combat excellence. [PAWN_pronoun] led successful campaigns against super mutant armies and raider confederations. [PAWN_possessive] power armor bears the scars of a hundred battles, and [PAWN_possessive] tactical acumen is respected throughout the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger Scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth scouting ruins and pre-war installations for the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] developed keen observation skills and learned to read the wasteland's dangers. [PAWN_possessive] ability to assess threats and opportunities proved invaluable.

BackstoryDef.title: Paladin Commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commands key Brotherhood outposts across the Midwest. [PAWN_pronoun] excels at coordinating multiple units and managing supply lines. [PAWN_possessive] strategic mind ensures Brotherhood forces are always well-positioned to respond to threats. [PAWN_pronoun] believes in the Brotherhood's mission to bring order to chaos.

BackstoryDef.title: Archive Assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the Brotherhood archives from childhood, organizing pre-war technical manuals and scientific journals. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a photographic memory for technical specifications and learned to decipher corrupted data files. The archives became [PAWN_possessive] second home.

BackstoryDef.title: Head Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became Head Scribe of the Midwestern Brotherhood, overseeing all research and technological development. [PAWN_pronoun] pioneered new applications of pre-war technology and trained a generation of scribes. [PAWN_possessive] work on power armor maintenance protocols saved countless lives.

BackstoryDef.title: Medical Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed aptitude for medicine and biology from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] studied pre-war medical texts and assisted senior scribes in treating wounded Brotherhood soldiers. [PAWN_possessive] steady hands and calm demeanor made [PAWN_objective] a natural healer.

BackstoryDef.title: Senior Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a Senior Scribe specializing in medical technology and biological research. [PAWN_pronoun] developed improved stimpak formulations and studied radiation treatment methods. [PAWN_possessive] research saved countless lives and improved quality of life across Brotherhood territories.

BackstoryDef.title: Wastelander Recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a settlement protected by the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed their power armor troops defend [PAWN_possessive] home from super mutant attacks and dreamed of joining them. [PAWN_pronoun] trained relentlessly to prove [PAWN_pronoun] was worthy of the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Knight Captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned [PAWN_possessive] place as a Knight Captain through dedication and courage. [PAWN_pronoun] leads squads in power armor patrols and maintains Brotherhood equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] represents the new generation of Brotherhood warriors - recruited from the wasteland but no less committed to the cause.

BackstoryDef.title: Engineer's Daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up learning to repair and maintain Brotherhood technology from [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] could disassemble a laser rifle blindfolded by age twelve. [PAWN_pronoun] combined technical expertise with combat training, preparing for a career as a Knight.

BackstoryDef.title: Knight Technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a Knight, combining combat capability with technical skill. [PAWN_pronoun] can fight effectively in power armor and perform field repairs under fire. [PAWN_possessive] dual expertise makes [PAWN_objective] invaluable on extended missions far from Brotherhood bases.
